game.name: Little Big Runners
game.description:
Oh my God! You are stuck in a land that is full of dangerous monsters and other deadly obstacles. It is difficult to survive through this environment where you are also being chased by a big monster. Do you still want to be a part of this world where survival possibilities are very low? If yes, join Little Big Runners and be prepared to run for life. You can grow and shrink at several points as per the central mechanic of this brand new adventure game. 
Keep your eyes on the screen to find a way through the unlimited deadly obstacles and escape the chasing monster! Try to keep your character away from the spikes and other hindrances and do not forget to collect the gems that you see along the way! Kill as many enemies as you can and collect as much coins as possible to finish your game with the maximum possible score! The longer he runs the higher score you will be able to make in the end. 
You would have multiple levels to play through and challenges and complexities will keep increasing as you progress in the game. Your character runs automatically, and your job in this HTML5 platformer game is to make him jump to avoid the obstacles and collect the gems. Use the up arrow key or space bar key to make him jump, and use it twice to give him a double jump! Do not forget to play some other cool platform games on atmegame.com to take your gaming fantasy to a new level. Good luck!

game.metaDesc: Play the online free game Little Big Runners at atmegame.com ! We have selected this platform games for best excitement and thrill in you!

game.mobileControlKeys: TAP ON THE SCREEN TO JUMP
game.webControlKeys: L-CLICK OF MOUSE/SPACE/UP ARROW TO JUMP,DOWN ARROW TO BIG/SMALL
